snippet: An Indian fisherman aboard a boat fired on by the United States Navy in the Persian Gulf has told officials the crew received no warning first.
abstract: Indian fisherman aboard a boat fired on by the United States Navy in the Persian Gulf tells officials the crew received no warning before the attack.
lead_paragraph: An Indian fisherman aboard a boat fired on by the United States Navy in the Persian Gulf has told officials the crew received no warning first.
